en.name: Moment of Victory
en.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by {{24//28//32//36//40%}} and Effect Hit Rate by {{24//28//32//36//40%}}. Increases the chance for the wearer to be attacked by enemies. When the wearer is attacked, increase their DEF by an extra {{24//28//32//36//40%}} until the end of the wearer's turn.

zh.name: 制胜的瞬间
zh.description: 使装备者的防御力提高{{24//28//32//36//40%}}，效果命中提高{{24//28//32//36//40%}}，同时使自身受到攻击的概率提高。当装备者受到攻击后，防御力额外提高{{24//28//32//36//40%}}，持续到自身回合结束。
